00022 extern UINT16 PickAWallPiece( UINT16 usWallPieceType );
00023 
00024 //This method isn't foolproof, but because erasing large areas of buildings could result in
00025 //multiple wall types for each building.  When processing the region, it is necessary to 
00026 //calculate the roof type by searching for the nearest roof tile.
00027 UINT16 SearchForWallType( UINT32 iMapIndex )
00028 {
00029       UINT32 uiTileType;
00030       LEVELNODE *pWall;
00031       INT16 sOffset;
00032       INT16 x, y, sRadius = 0;
00033       if( gfBasement )
00034       {
00035             UINT16 usWallType;
00036             usWallType = GetRandomIndexByRange( FIRSTWALL, LASTWALL );
00037             if( usWallType == 0xffff )
00038                   usWallType = FIRSTWALL;
00039             return usWallType;
00040       }
00041       while( sRadius < 32 )
00042       {
00043             //NOTE:  start at the higher y value and go negative because it is possible to have another
00044             // structure type one tile north, but not one tile south -- so it'll find the correct wall first.
00045             for( y = sRadius; y >= -sRadius; y-- ) for( x = -sRadius; x <= sRadius; x++ )
00046             {
00047                   if( abs(x) == abs(sRadius) || abs(y) == abs(sRadius) )
00048                   {
00049                         sOffset = y * WORLD_COLS + x;
00050                         if( !GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( (INT16)(iMapIndex + sOffset) ) )
00051                         {
00052                               continue;
00053                         }
00054                         pWall = gpWorldLevelData[ iMapIndex + sOffset ].pStructHead;
00055                         while( pWall )
00056                         {
00057                               GetTileType( pWall->usIndex, &uiTileType );
00058                               if( uiTileType >= FIRSTWALL && uiTileType <= LASTWALL )
00059                               {     //found a roof, so return its type.
00060                                     return (UINT16)uiTileType;
00061                               }
00062                               //if( uiTileType >= FIRSTWINDOW && uiTileType <= LASTWINDOW )
00063                               //{   //Window types can be converted to a wall type.
00064                               //    return (UINT16)(FIRSTWALL + uiTileType - FIRSTWINDOW );
00065                               //}
00066                               pWall = pWall->pNext;
00067                         }
00068                   }
00069             }
00070             sRadius++;
00071       }
00072       return 0xffff;
00073 }
00074 
00075 //This method isn't foolproof, but because erasing large areas of buildings could result in
00076 //multiple roof types for each building.  When processing the region, it is necessary to 
00077 //calculate the roof type by searching for the nearest roof tile.
00078 UINT16 SearchForRoofType( UINT32 iMapIndex )
00079 {
00080       UINT32 uiTileType;
00081       LEVELNODE *pRoof;
00082       INT16 x, y, sRadius = 0;
00083       INT16 sOffset;
00084       while( sRadius < 32 )
00085       {
00086             for( y = -sRadius; y <= sRadius; y++ ) for( x = -sRadius; x <= sRadius; x++ )
00087             {
00088                   if( abs(x) == abs(sRadius) || abs(y) == abs(sRadius) )
00089                   {
00090                         sOffset = y * WORLD_COLS + x;
00091                         if( !GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( (INT16)(iMapIndex + sOffset) ) )
00092                         {
00093                               continue;
00094                         }
00095                         pRoof = gpWorldLevelData[ iMapIndex + sOffset ].pRoofHead;
00096                         while( pRoof )
00097                         {
00098                               GetTileType( pRoof->usIndex, &uiTileType );
00099                               if( uiTileType >= FIRSTROOF && uiTileType <= LASTROOF )
00100                               {     //found a roof, so return its type.
00101                                     return (UINT16)uiTileType;
00102                               }
00103                               pRoof = pRoof->pNext;
00104                         }
00105                   }
00106             }
00107             sRadius++;
00108       }
00109       return 0xffff;
00110 }
00111       
00112 BOOLEAN RoofAtGridNo( UINT32 iMapIndex )
00113 {
00114       LEVELNODE   *pRoof;
00115       UINT32 uiTileType;
00116       pRoof = gpWorldLevelData[ iMapIndex ].pRoofHead;
00117       // Look through all objects and Search for type
00118       while( pRoof )
00119       {
00120             if ( pRoof->usIndex != NO_TILE )
00121             {
00122                   GetTileType( pRoof->usIndex, &uiTileType );
00123                   if ( uiTileType >= FIRSTROOF && uiTileType <= SECONDSLANTROOF )
00124                         return TRUE;
00125                   pRoof = pRoof->pNext;
00126             }
00127       }
00128       return FALSE;
00129 }
00130 
00131 BOOLEAN BuildingAtGridNo( UINT32 iMapIndex )
00132 {
00133       if( RoofAtGridNo( iMapIndex ) )
00134             return TRUE;
00135       if( FloorAtGridNo( iMapIndex ) )
00136             return TRUE;
00137       return FALSE;
00138 }
00139 
00140 BOOLEAN ValidDecalPlacement( UINT32 iMapIndex )
00141 {
00142       if( GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex ) || GetHorizontalWall( iMapIndex ) 
00143                   || GetVerticalFence( iMapIndex ) || GetHorizontalFence( iMapIndex ) )
00144             return TRUE;
00145       return FALSE;
00146 }
00147 
00148 LEVELNODE* GetVerticalWall( UINT32 iMapIndex )
00149 {
00150       LEVELNODE *pStruct;
00151       UINT32 uiTileType;
00152       UINT16 usWallOrientation;
00153       pStruct = gpWorldLevelData[ iMapIndex ].pStructHead;
00154       while( pStruct )
00155       {
00156             if ( pStruct->usIndex != NO_TILE )
00157             {
00158                   GetTileType( pStruct->usIndex, &uiTileType );
00159                   if ( uiTileType >= FIRSTWALL && uiTileType <= LASTWALL ||
00160                                uiTileType >= FIRSTDOOR && uiTileType <= LASTDOOR )
00161                   {
00162                         GetWallOrientation( pStruct->usIndex, &usWallOrientation );
00163                         if( usWallOrientation == INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT || usWallOrientation == OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT )
00164                         {
00165                               return pStruct;
00166                         }
00167                   }
00168             }
00169             pStruct = pStruct->pNext;
00170       }
00171       return NULL;
00172 }
00173

00183             {
00184                   GetTileType( pStruct->usIndex, &uiTileType );
00185                   if ( uiTileType >= FIRSTWALL && uiTileType <= LASTWALL ||
00186                                uiTileType >= FIRSTDOOR && uiTileType <= LASTDOOR )
00187                   {
00188                         GetWallOrientation( pStruct->usIndex, &usWallOrientation );
00189                         if( usWallOrientation == INSIDE_TOP_LEFT || usWallOrientation == OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT )
00190                         {
00191                               return pStruct;
00192                         }
00193                   }
00194             }
00195             pStruct = pStruct->pNext;

00200 UINT16 GetVerticalWallType( UINT32 iMapIndex )
00201 {
00202       LEVELNODE *pWall;
00203       UINT32 uiTileType;
00204       pWall = GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex );
00205       if( pWall )
00206       {
00207             GetTileType( pWall->usIndex, &uiTileType );
00208             if( uiTileType >= FIRSTDOOR && uiTileType <= LASTDOOR )
00209                   uiTileType = SearchForWallType( iMapIndex );
00210             return (UINT16)uiTileType;
00211       }
00212       return 0;
00213 }

00230 LEVELNODE* GetVerticalFence( UINT32 iMapIndex )
00231 {
00232       LEVELNODE *pStruct;
00233       UINT32 uiTileType;
00234       UINT16 usWallOrientation;
00235       pStruct = gpWorldLevelData[ iMapIndex ].pStructHead;
00236       while( pStruct )
00237       {
00238             if ( pStruct->usIndex != NO_TILE )
00239             {
00240                   GetTileType( pStruct->usIndex, &uiTileType );
00241                   if ( uiTileType == FENCESTRUCT )
00242                   {
00243                         GetWallOrientation( pStruct->usIndex, &usWallOrientation );
00244                         if( usWallOrientation == INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT || usWallOrientation == OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT )
00245                         {
00246                               return pStruct;
00247                         }
00248                   }
00249             }
00250             pStruct = pStruct->pNext;
00251       }
00252       return NULL;
00253 }

00280 void EraseHorizontalWall( UINT32 iMapIndex )
00281 {
00282       LEVELNODE *pWall;
00283       pWall = GetHorizontalWall( iMapIndex );
00284       if( pWall )
00285       {
00286             AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
00287             RemoveStruct( iMapIndex, pWall->usIndex );
00288             RemoveAllShadowsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTWALL, LASTWALL );
00289       }
00290 }
00291 
00292 void EraseVerticalWall( UINT32 iMapIndex )
00293 {
00294       LEVELNODE *pWall;
00295       pWall = GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex );
00296       if( pWall )
00297       {
00298             AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
00299             RemoveStruct( iMapIndex, pWall->usIndex );
00300             RemoveAllShadowsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTWALL, LASTWALL );
00301       }
00302 }
00303 
00304 void ChangeHorizontalWall( UINT32 iMapIndex, UINT16 usNewPiece )
00305 {
00306       LEVELNODE *pWall;
00307       UINT32 uiTileType;
00308       UINT16 usTileIndex;
00309       INT16 sIndex;
00310       pWall = GetHorizontalWall( iMapIndex );
00311       if( pWall )
00312       {
00313             GetTileType( pWall->usIndex, &uiTileType );
00314             if( uiTileType >= FIRSTWALL && uiTileType <= LASTWALL )
00315             { //Okay, we have the wall, now change it's type.
00316                   sIndex = PickAWallPiece( usNewPiece );
00317                   AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
00318                   GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( uiTileType, sIndex, &usTileIndex );
00319                   ReplaceStructIndex( iMapIndex, pWall->usIndex, usTileIndex );
00320             }
00321       }
00322 }
00323 
00324 void ChangeVerticalWall( UINT32 iMapIndex, UINT16 usNewPiece )
00325 {
00326       LEVELNODE *pWall;
00327       UINT32 uiTileType;
00328       UINT16 usTileIndex;
00329       INT16 sIndex;
00330       pWall = GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex );
00331       if( pWall )
00332       {
00333             GetTileType( pWall->usIndex, &uiTileType );
00334             if( uiTileType >= FIRSTWALL && uiTileType <= LASTWALL )
00335             { //Okay, we have the wall, now change it's type.
00336                   sIndex = PickAWallPiece( usNewPiece );
00337                   AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
00338                   GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( uiTileType, sIndex, &usTileIndex );
00339                   ReplaceStructIndex( iMapIndex, pWall->usIndex, usTileIndex );
00340             }
00341       }
00342 }
00343 
00344 void RestoreWalls( UINT32 iMapIndex )
00345 {
00346       LEVELNODE *pWall = NULL;
00347       UINT32 uiTileType;
00348       UINT16 usWallType;
00349       UINT16 usWallOrientation;
00350       UINT8 ubSaveWallUIValue;
00351       BOOLEAN fDone = FALSE;
00352 
00353       pWall = GetHorizontalWall( iMapIndex );
00354       if( pWall )
00355       {
00356             GetTileType( pWall->usIndex, &uiTileType );
00357             usWallType = (UINT16)uiTileType;
00358             if( uiTileType >= FIRSTDOOR && uiTileType <= LASTDOOR )
00359                   usWallType = SearchForWallType( iMapIndex );
00360             GetWallOrientation( pWall->usIndex, &usWallOrientation );
00361             AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
00362             RemoveStruct( iMapIndex, pWall->usIndex );
00363             RemoveAllShadowsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTWALL, LASTWALL );
00364             switch( usWallOrientation )
00365             {
00366                   case OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
00367                         BuildWallPiece( iMapIndex, INTERIOR_BOTTOM, usWallType );
00368                         break;
00369                   case INSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
00370                         BuildWallPiece( iMapIndex, EXTERIOR_BOTTOM, usWallType );
00371                         break;
00372             }
00373             fDone = TRUE;
00374       }
00375       pWall = GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex );
00376       if( pWall )
00377       {
00378             GetTileType( pWall->usIndex, &uiTileType );
00379             usWallType = (UINT16)uiTileType;
00380             if( uiTileType >= FIRSTDOOR && uiTileType <= LASTDOOR )
00381                   usWallType = SearchForWallType( iMapIndex );
00382             GetWallOrientation( pWall->usIndex, &usWallOrientation );
00383             AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
00384             RemoveStruct( iMapIndex, pWall->usIndex );
00385             RemoveAllShadowsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTWALL, LASTWALL );
00386             switch( usWallOrientation )
00387             {
00388                   case OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
00389                         BuildWallPiece( iMapIndex, INTERIOR_RIGHT, usWallType );
00390                         break;
00391                   case INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
00392                         BuildWallPiece( iMapIndex, EXTERIOR_RIGHT, usWallType );
00393                         break;
00394             }
00395             fDone = TRUE;
00396       }
00397       if( fDone )
00398       {
00399             return;
00400       }
00401       //we are in a special case here.  The user is attempting to restore a wall, though nothing 
00402       //is here.  We will hook into the smart wall method by tricking it into using the local wall
00403       //type, but only if we have adjacent walls.
00404       fDone = FALSE;
00405       if( pWall = GetHorizontalWall( iMapIndex - 1 ) )
00406         fDone = TRUE;
00407       if( !fDone && (pWall = GetHorizontalWall( iMapIndex + 1 )) )
00408             fDone = TRUE;
00409       if( !fDone && (pWall = GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex - WORLD_COLS )) )
00410             fDone = TRUE;
00411       if( !fDone && (pWall = GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex + WORLD_COLS )) )
00412             fDone = TRUE;
00413       if( !fDone )
00414             return;
00415       //found a wall.  Let's back up the current wall value, and restore it after pasting a smart wall.
00416       if( pWall )
00417       {
00418             GetTileType( pWall->usIndex, &uiTileType );
00419             usWallType = (UINT16)uiTileType;
00420             if( uiTileType >= FIRSTDOOR && uiTileType <= LASTDOOR )
00421                   usWallType = SearchForWallType( iMapIndex );
00422             if( usWallType != 0xffff )
00423             {
00424                   ubSaveWallUIValue = gubWallUIValue; //save the wall UI value.
00425                   gubWallUIValue = (UINT8)usWallType; //trick the UI value 
00426                   PasteSmartWall( iMapIndex );                    //paste smart wall with fake UI value
00427                   gubWallUIValue = ubSaveWallUIValue; //restore the real UI value.
00428             }
00429       }
00430 }
00431 
00432 UINT16 GetWallClass( LEVELNODE *pWall )
00433 {
00434       UINT16 row, col, rowVariants;
00435       UINT16 usWallIndex;
00436       if( !pWall )
00437             return 0xffff;
00438       GetSubIndexFromTileIndex( pWall->usIndex, &usWallIndex );
00439       for ( row = 0; row < NUM_WALL_TYPES; row++ )
00440       {
00441             rowVariants = gbWallTileLUT[row][0];
00442             for( col = 1; col <= rowVariants; col++ )
00443             {
00444                   if( usWallIndex == gbWallTileLUT[row][col] )
00445                   {
00446                         return row;  //row is the wall class
00447                   }
00448             }
00449       }
00450       return 0xffff;
00451 }
00452 
00453 UINT16 GetVerticalWallClass( UINT16 iMapIndex )
00454 {
00455       LEVELNODE *pWall;
00456       if( pWall = GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex ) )
00457             return GetWallClass( pWall );
00458       return 0xffff;
00459 }
00460 
00461 UINT16 GetHorizontalWallClass( UINT16 iMapIndex )
00462 {
00463       LEVELNODE *pWall;
00464       if( pWall = GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex ) )
00465             return GetWallClass( pWall );
00466       return 0xffff;
00467 }
